snippet: Riding high after winning their first four games, the Mets received disturbing news Tuesday when David Wright was scratched from the lineup because of a small fracture at the middle joint of the pinkie of his right hand.
abstract: Riding high after winning their first four games, the Mets received disturbing news Tuesday when David Wright was scratched from the lineup because of a small fracture at the middle joint of the pinkie of his right hand.

headline.main: Mets' Wright Has Small Fracture in Pinkie
